channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti (white aerosol paint) sprayed on 'double chevron' road sign, 24th February
item.description:
'Double chevron' sign on St James roundabout, Honeybourne Way, facing uphill towards St George's Road. Roundabout is in front of Waitrose filling station and below Millennium footbridge. Seen on Sat 17th Feb 2024. What3Words location = total.else.jungle. Note that the photos are from Google Street View and pre-date the graffiti.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Saint James' Roundabout, St Paul’s, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Apologies to add to the long list but I have counted 25+ potholes from Morrissons up to the Turing for Broad Oak Way. I realise that many repairs are taking place at the moment but would consider that the top part of the road is a concern. Please could you consider a full surface coverage including all the speed bumps?, 24th February
item.description:
Majority of Caernarvon Road including the speed bumps which have eroded quite badly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 123, Caernarvon Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree leaning out into above the hihgwaythi, 24th February
item.description:
The tree appears to be leaning more over a short time (the last few weeks) This poses a potential hazard to both vehicles school busses, vans, and pedestrians etc using this road onto the estate. Oldbury Road is a busy road at certain times.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Oldbury Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
